basics.name: vmName
basics.label: Virtual Machine Name
basics.toolTip: Enter the name for the virtual machine.

constraints.validationMessage: VM name must be 3-15 characters long and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

basics.name: adminUsername
basics.label: Admin Username
basics.toolTip: Enter the administrator username for the VM.

constraints.validationMessage: Username must start with a letter and can contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores. Maximum 64 characters.

basics.name: authenticationType
basics.label: Authentication type
basics.toolTip: Choose authentication type for the VM.

toolTip.authenticationType: Enter the administrator password for the VM.
toolTip.sshPublicKey: Enter the SSH public key for the VM.

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: Select the size of the virtual machine.

elements.name: brandName
elements.label: Brand Name
elements.toolTip: Enter the brand name for the application setup.

constraints.validationMessage: Brand name must start with alphanumeric character and can contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and underscores. Maximum 50 characters.

elements.name: username
elements.label: Application Username
elements.toolTip: Enter the username for the application setup.

constraints.validationMessage: Username must start with a letter and can contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores. Maximum 50 characters.

elements.name: password
elements.label: Application Password
elements.toolTip: Enter the password for the application setup.

constraints.validationMessage: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
